title: Brand Marketing Manager
content:
About Applied Intuition
Applied Intuition is a vehicle software supplier that accelerates the adoption of safe and intelligent machines worldwide. Founded in 2017, Applied Intuition provides a simulation and validation platform for various industries such as automotive, trucking, construction, and more. 17 of the top 20 global automakers rely on Applied Intuition’s solutions to shorten development cycles, deliver high-quality systems, and accelerate the production of modern vehicles with confidence. Applied Intuition is headquartered in Mountain View, CA, with offices in Ann Arbor, MI, Washington, DC, Munich, Stockholm, Seoul, and Tokyo. Learn more at https://applied.co.About the role
As a Brand Marketing Manager at Applied Intuition, you will be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies, website presence, and overall communication to establish Applied Intuition as a leader in the vehicle software industry. You will play a crucial role in growing our brand from the ground up and promoting our product portfolio to a breadth of audiences while ensuring consistent messaging across all channels.
At Applied Intuition, you will:

Define brand strategy, positioning, and voice that resonates with our target audience through digital campaigns, experiential activation, and social channels.
Collaborate with the web development team to optimize Applied Intuition’s website. Ensure it reflects our brand identity, provides a seamless user experience, and drives consistency across all products and solutions.
Develop and implement a comprehensive SEO strategy to improve our website’s search engine ranking, increase organic traffic, and generate high-quality leads. Monitor and analyze keywords to drive SEO performance.
Create and manage marketing communication campaigns that highlight our products, solutions, and thought leadership in the vehicle software space. Deliver compelling content across blogs, social media, email marketing, and influencer campaigns.
Craft and distribute press releases that announce significant company news, product launches, partnerships, and industry achievements. Build relationships with relevant media outlets and industry influencers to ensure wide coverage.

We’re looking for someone who has:

A Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in brand marketing.
Familiarity with web development, UX/UI principles, and content management systems (WordPress, Webflow, etc).
Experience working at a Software company.
Creative thinking and the ability to research the competition and present a differentiated point of view.

Nice to have:

Master’s degree from a top-tier program.
Autonomous Vehicles, Robotics, or Automotive experience.

The salary range for this position is $65,000 USD to $400,000 USD annually. This salary range is an estimate, and the actual salary may vary based on the Company's compensation practices.Don’t meet every single requirement? If you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles.
Applicants will be required to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 upon commencing employment. Reasonable accommodations will be considered on a case-by-case basis for exemptions to this requirement in accordance with applicable federal and state law. The Company will engage in the interactive process on an individualized basis taking into account the particular position.
